title: How India is failing it's educated youth
selftext: Interesting reporting by Bloomberg on unemployment among Indian youth. Makes complete sense to me, and as more and more Indians seek a better life through education, I see the situation getting worse before it gets better.
comments: Apologies but I had not seen it before
